tn.ref: the first day of the first month of the new year
tn.text: The new year marks the time when God rescued his people from Egypt. This happens around the middle of March on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
Yahweh continues to tell Moses what the people must do.

tn.ref: place the ark of the testimony in it
tn.text: "place the ark of the covenant decrees in the sacred chest"

tn.ref: shield the ark with the curtain
tn.text: "put the ark behind the curtain"
Yahweh continues to tell Moses what the people must do.
This refers to the "sacred chest" (UDB).
Yahweh continues to tell Moses what the people must do.
"all the things that are a part of it"
Yahweh continues speaking to Moses.
Moses will do these things himself.

tn.ref: that are set apart to me
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "that you have set apart to me" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
Yahweh continues speaking to Moses.
"through all the generations of their descendants." See how you translated a similar phrase in [[:en:bible:notes:exo:12:12|12:14]].

tn.ref: So the tabernacle was set up
tn.text: This can be stated in active form. AT: "So the people set up the tabernacle" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

tn.ref: the first day of the first month
tn.text: This refers to exactly one year after God rescued his people from Egypt. This happens around the middle of March on Western calendars. See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:exo:40:01|40:2]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
This is the second year after Yahweh brought his people out of Egypt. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
Moses was the leader. The people helped him set up the tabernacle. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
a strong piece of wood set upright and used as a support
Moses was the leader. He had workers helping him.
"in front of"

tn.ref: He put the lampstand into the tent of meeting
tn.text: Moses instructed his workers to move the lampstand. This can be stated clearly in the translation. AT: "Moses' workmen set the lampstand inside the sacred tent" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])

This curtain separated the holy place from the very holy place. This can be stated clearly in the translation. AT: "in front of the curtain that separated the holy place from the very holy place" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])

tn.ref: washed their hands and their feet from the basin
tn.text: They washed with water from the basin. This can be stated clearly in the translation. AT: "washed their hands and their feet with water from the basin" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
"And so"
"Yahweh's awesome presence filled"
This can be stated in active form. AT: "rose up from" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
This can be stated in active form. AT: "when it rose up" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
